Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Match, Restore, ServerController
public class Controller extends Object implements ServerController, Match, Restore
Controller class controls model and communicates with server. It creates game and initialize it or restore it from a previous match.

  • Constructor Summary

    Create controller ready for manage a new (or restored) game.

    • Controller

      public Controller(int numberOfPlayers, boolean isExpert, ControllerServer server, String fileName)
      Create controller ready for manage a new (or restored) game.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - of this match;
      isExpert - indicate our game mode;
      server - reference with server;
      fileName - where save game;

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int playerRef, String chosenAssistants) throws NotAllowedException
      Method to play a card: it collects in an ArrayList already played cards in this turn and send to model it with the card chosen. It also set, if player finished his cards, the game will end at the end of the turn.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface ServerController
      Parameters:
      playerRef - reference to the player which play the card;
      chosenAssistants - the card played;
      Throws:
      NotAllowedException - if player doesn't have that card in his hand or someone just played this card in this turn;
      See Also:
      • Controller

      Notify to the roundController that the turn of current user is over. It also set phase of game in virtualView.

      Parameters:
